snippet: A Palestinian man has died after setting himself on fire, apparently in response to the economic hardships in Gaza, his family and the police said Monday.
abstract: Palestinian man dies after setting himself on fire, apparently in response to the economic hardships in Gaza.
lead_paragraph: A Palestinian man has died after setting himself on fire, apparently in response to the economic hardships in Gaza, his family and the police said Monday.

headline.seo: In Despair, Palestinian Man Sets Himself on Fire
